title: Everything is Connected to Narayana in Loving Service | @ChanchalapathiDas
speaker: HG Chanchalapathi Dasa

segments.text: Just like in business they say, we are very customer focused.
That means they are saying, we are customer para.
We want to please our customers.
We want to satisfy our customers.
We want to delight our customers.
Brahma is saying, Vedas are Narayana para.
Makaha, the sacrifices are meant for Narayana.
Everything is related to Vasudeva, Narayana.
Without that, it has no meaning or value.
